results.title: Live Well Laugh Often Love Much | Removable Indoor Vinyl | Wall Decal | Wall Decor | Wall Quotes | Wall Sayings | Vinyl Quotes | Wall Phrase
results.description:
Welcome to Stone Raven Design Studio - Home Decor Connected To Your Soul!

Live Well Laugh Often Love Much decal is perfect for your bedroom or living room wall. Choose from 4 different sizes.

Small: 16W x 3.5H Inches
Medium: 24W x 5H Inches
Large: 30W x 6H Inches
X-Large: 36W x 7.5H Inches

Make a statement in your home, office, or business and have the ability to remove when you are ready for a change.

Our wall decals are designed and cut in-house from the highest quality removable vinyl (Oracal 631). MADE IN THE USA.

See color chart image for available colors. Colors may vary from what you see on your screen due to lighting, monitor settings and other variables.

Photos are not to scale. Please measure your space to ensure an accurate fit.
© All images and designs are copyright protected or licensed by Stone Raven Design Studio

Visit https://www.etsy.com/shop/StoneRavenDesign to see all available home decor. Favorite my shop to be notified when new pieces are posted.

--------------------------------------
INCLUDED IN YOUR ORDER
--------------------------------------

Vinyl Decal
Detailed Installation Instructions
Test Decal

------------------------------
ABOUT OUR DECALS
------------------------------

Our removable decals adhere to most smooth surface such as low/un-textured walls, windows, mirrors, cabinets, laptops, appliances, tiles, interior doors, metal and more! Our removable decals can be easily removed without damage to your surface or paint and will not leave any adhesive residue. Our decals are removable, but are not re-usable.

Use the test decal to ensure our decals will apply to your wall/surface or to see how the selected color looks against your wall/surface color.

--------------------------------------
CUSTOM DECALS
--------------------------------------
I can create custom decals to your liking. Send me an Etsy conversation and we can discuss the details. Example images are encouraged to show what you would like. Once I have the requested information, I will create a custom listing with your name on it for purchase/payment.

-------------------------------
SHIPPING & RETURNS
-------------------------------

Please allow 5-7 business days for production. Orders are shipped through USPS First Class or USPS Priority Mail. Please keep in mind, shipping times are currently longer than usual because of COVID-19.

If you are not satisfied with your purchase, the item can be returned for a full refund (minus the shipping charges). Returned items must be in original, unused condition. Items can only be returned if they have not been modified and/or altered in any way. No partial returns are allowed. Buyer is responsible for return shipping costs and must contact us for an RMA number before returning the item to us. Refunds will not be granted without this RMA number.


© All images and designs are copyright protected or licensed by Stone Raven Design Studio

results.title: Live Laugh Love Ring, Sterling Silver Thumb Ring Jewelry, Band
results.description:
Live Laugh Love Ring, Sterling Silver Thumb Ring Jewelry, Band

Live Laugh Love Band.  This ring started as a hand carved wax.  Then I cast the wax sculpture with the finest sterling silver using the lost wax casting method and the result was this amazing ring.    

This ring is made to order, please allow 2-3 weeks to be cast into sterling silver.   Ring is a Size 9 or 9 1/2  

I specialize in hand made jewelry using the lost-cast method. The original wax sculpture of the jewelry piece melts away and is "lost" in the casting process.  The impression that it leaves is then filled with molten silver that hardens to the exact likeness in solid silver.   

Nice antique patina finish.   

Ring size 9 and 9 1/2 are ready to ship 

Stamped inside shank, .925

Materials used to make this Custom Ring:

♦  The finest .925 Sterling Silver 

Ring shank (band) is 5.3 MM wide.

Not sure of your ring size?   Click below for the listing to my reusable ring sizer:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/260410648/ring-sizer-ring-size-measurer

Visit my shop here: https://www.etsy.com/shop/DesignedbyLin

Nice gift for the special person in your life or treat yourself!  

All of my pieces are hallmarked (quality), stamped  inside the band.

Gift box is Included.

Before purchasing make sure the software you use supports SVG, PNG, and/or DXF files. And that you are able to open ZIP files. 

Make sure you are registered and signed into your Etsy account before purchasing the file(s). If you check out as a guest, it may take several hours for you to receive an email from Etsy containing the link(s) to download your file(s).

TERMS OF USE

You may use this design for personal needs, gifts, small business needs (Up to 20 units for sale).

If you plan on selling more than 20 units, contact me and I’ll give you a quote for commercial use.

You may not share the files as they are in any way, for free or for sale. You may not use any part of it to create other digital designs and share them for free or for sale. You may not reformat the file or any part of it and share them for free or for sale.

results.title: Snap Charm Jewelry 18-20mm Interchangeable Snap Button: Football, Happy Camper, Love U to the Moon, Heart Snap Jewelry, Ginger Snap Noosa
results.description:
These fun 18-20mm Snap Charm Buttons are interchangeable. Snap button jewelry can be changed out to whatever your mood, season, holiday, or occasion may be. 

I Love Football
Crown Snap Charm
Love Snap Charm
Heart Snap Charm
Happy Camper Snap Charm
I Love You to the Moon and Back Snap Charm
Live Laugh Love Snap Charm
Paw Print Snap Charm
Sun and Moon Snap Charm 


Snap Jewelry Charm Care Instructions:

*These are fashion jewelry snap charms and can be made of various base metals such as Zinc Alloy, Copper, Silver, and/or Rhodium Plated. As with all fashion jewelry, tarnishing may naturally occur over time. If tarnishing does occur, use a dry polishing cloth to gently wipe them.

*Do not use jewelry cleaners or other chemicals, as these products are corrosive and will strip the finish on the snap charm jewelry causing permanent damage.

*Limit exposing your jewelry to water or sweating. Do not shower, swim, or work out with your jewelry. 

*When not wearing your snap charm jewelry, store in an airtight container or zip-lock bag.


What is Snap Charm Jewelry?

Snap Charm Jewelry is trendy and unique. Create your own one-of-a-kind pieces of jewelry "in a snap" with a variety of snap charm buttons. There are a variety of snap bases on the market to add your snap charms including earrings, bracelets, pendants, necklaces, brooch pins, etc. You won't get bored with your snap charm jewelry, just change out the snap button and voila!, you have a newly designed piece of jewelry. Change you snaps to fit your mood, holiday, occasion, or season.


WARNING:  CHOKING HAZARD - Small Parts

Snap Charm Decoration and Jewelry Products are NOT intended for children. These snap charm decorative and jewelry items contain small parts and are for decoration and fashion only.  These are NOT toys.
materials: Love you to the moon and back

results.title: Needle Minder for Cross Stitch Punch Needle Threader Holder Fridge Magnet Live Love and Laugh Set of 3
results.description:
Needle Minder for Cross Stitch Punch Needle Threader Holder Fridge Magnet Live Love and Laugh Set of 3

Perfect for holding your cross stitch needles.  Another great use is holding punch needle.  

These magnet measures 2.25" and has 2 rare earth magnets.  One on the actual needle minder and one for the underside of your fabric.  

These magnets are very strong and should not be stored around electronic devices.  

As they are small, keep away from small children as well as pets.

results.title: Live Well Laugh Often Love Much Stained Glass Window Hanging Panel
results.description:
This window hanging  was hand crafted by me.
It was made  using the "Tiffany style" stained glass method.
Glass was hand cut,copper foiled applied to the pieces, soldered together,and a black patina
applied to the solder and polished with wax.
Some of the pieces of glass are beveled.

 A link chain is attached to hang glass from a suction cup.
Suction cup is included.
The Etched glass reads: Live Well Laugh Often Love Much
Wonderful gift for yourself, your best friend, or someone special in your life.

Live...Love...Bark Personalized Charm Bracelet
 
This very clever personalized bracelet pendant is circular-shaped, and made of stainless steel, and features the popular phrase "Live, Love, Laugh" with the last word replaced by the word "Bark" in a whimsical black font. 

Clever gift for yourself or that dog lover in your tribe! Great Valentine's Day gift for your dog loving friends and family!

This shiny, round charm pendant measures 19 mm x 22 mm and is attached to a silver bracelet. The adjustable bracelet, made from a heavy-duty zinc alloy, adjusts from 8 inches up to 10.5 inches for a perfect fit every time! Secured with a lobster clasp. The charms are connected to the bracelet with a sturdy split ring that will never come apart! 

This set can be personalized with a round stainless steel disc, 10 mm in diameter, stamped with an initial letter. Choose extra initial discs at checkout to customize your bracelet with the initials of all of your beloved pets!

This charming dog lover themed charm bracelet arrives ready for gifting in an organza bag.

**Same Day Shipping** 
Most items ship same business day (ordered before 1pm PST).

results.title: Wine wall hanging - live laugh love wine decor - purple gold green black - small narrow quilted door hanging - hanger sold separately
results.description:
Live laugh love all go well with wine.  Add this special piece to your wine or fall decor.  It is just the right size for that small space in your home or on the front door.   Also available - 12" metal hanger (sold separately) allows for easy change up of seasonal hangings.  Simply slide the rod through the placket sewn on the back of the hanging.   Reuse the hanger for other seasonal hangings up to 12" wide. 

Wall hanging dimensions:  12" wide x 16" long

The wall hanging was constructed  beginning with a center block with pieced borders in complimentary fabrics.   Backed with a burgundy, tonal print and layered with cotton/polyester batting, a random, scrolling design was used to quilt the main section of the hanging.   A hanging sleeve was added to the back and the piece was bound with a tonal, olive green print.     

Metal hanger is painted white and sold separately.    

Care instructions:  Remove metal hanger.  Machine wash cold; do not use bleach.  Tumble dry low heat.  To minimize fading, avoid direct sunlight.

Back to 12 Inch Wall Hangings:
http://etsy.me/1dJY6O0

Continue shopping:
http://etsy.me/1hh1kDy

Farmhouse Signs for every room in your home! We offer rustic home decor that inspires and modernizes your living space. Frames are hand cut, finished with a weathered look appearance, and expertly crafted into a high-quality farmhouse piece of art.

FarmhousePlaques will help you with the perfect home decor piece for every room in your home. Shop online with ease, order, and soon you will be hanging a timeless and classic sign. results.title: Gift For Family, Family Shirt, Laugh Shirt, Live with Love Family Shirt,Live with Laugh Shirt,Family the ones you Shirt
results.description:
Premium quality super soft shirts and hoodies for loved ones.

⇒⇒ PRODUCT DETAILS

All products are unisex. (Please check images for detailed charts.)
%52 cotton, %48 polyester. (Airlume combed and ringspun Cotton, 32 singles)
Shoulder taping for extra durability at stress points
Side-seamed to fit your curves best and to prevent torquing when you wash it.
It helps to hold the structure of the garment and keeps that big bold chest print front and center right where it’s supposed to be.

⇒⇒ How Do I Order

❶ Please review all the information provided before placing your order
❷ Select the item type and size using the drop down menu
❸ Select the color of the shirt/hoodie using the following drop down menu. Don’t ignore checking all color options.
❹ Lettering color is white for dark garments and black for lighter ones. If you prefer gold lettering, please indicate it in the personalization box.
❺ We can customize texts on t-shirts and hoodies but we CANNOT change the images and vectors.
❻ Need more Items? Add the current item to the cart and press the back button. Repeat steps 1-5 again.
You may complete your order by entering your payment method, desired shipping address and clicking submit.

⇒⇒ CARE INSTRUCTIONS

Do not bleach. Do not dry clean. Wash inside out in cold water. Lay flat to dry. Iron inside out. Never iron directly on the design.

Products are unisex and relaxed fit. You may consider a down size for a more feminine look. Please have a look at the size chart available in each listing.

All products are made-to-order and because of the nature of these items, all sales are final unless they arrive damaged or defective.
👉👉👉We can customize texts on the products but we cannot change images and vectors.  Lettering color is white for dark garments and black for lighter ones. If you prefer gold lettering or customization text, please indicate it in the personalization box for each shirt.
